subject: RE: Re: Starter
msgSnippet: Several folks have emailed me with similar suggestions.  I have uploaded a text version of the JUnit FAQ to the files section.  New subscribers will
messageBody:
Several folks have emailed me with similar suggestions. I have
uploaded a text version of the JUnit FAQ to the files section. New
subscribers will automatically have it sent to them.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/JUnit%20FAQ.txt

Thanks to everyone for the suggestions!

Erik Meade
http://junit.org
emeade@...

> -----Original Message-----
> Date: Wed, 16 Jan 2002 14:35:44 -0600
> From: "Chappell, Simon P" <simon.chappell@...>
> Subject: RE: Re: Starter
>
> The FAQ is very good and answers a lot of really good questions. I am
> convinced that new members of this list are not taking the time to click
> on the link and go to the FAQ page and read it. Could new members be
> sent two emails? The first would be the welcome to the group, feel the
> lurve email and the second would be a copy of the FAQ, which is not that
> long and shouldn't blow most people out of the water.
>
> Just my 1/50th of a U.S. Federal note. :-)
>
> Simon
